mapper.select:
select id, name from submission_plan
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into submission_plan (name, create_user_id, create_user_nick_name, type, journal, status, remark, submission_create_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserNickName}, #{type}, #{journal}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{submissionCreateTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
